name: Revenge of the Blue Dinosaurs
description: WOW! This is my amazing SpongeBob Fangame. It's called Revenge of the Blue Dinosaurs. It's made with Darkyoshi Mario Engine 4. Thanks to Nickelodeon, MondoMedia, VinnyVideo, GoombaDave, HappyTreeFriendsMickeyMouseFan60, Me and Others for Supporting This.
